name: ITINERARY OF THE INCA TRAIL 4 DAYS
short_description:
FIRST DAY THE START OF THE ADVENTURE
The kilometer 82 is where the trail starts. 40 minutes before the km 82 there will be a breakfast stop in Ollantaytambo (06:30-7am) to load up on energy (breakfast – not included).
THE SECOND DAY – THE MOST CHALLENGING DAY
After waking up at 5:30am (maybe at 05:00-depending on your Guide) and having breakfast, we will start a steep ascent towards the highest pass (Abra de Warrmihuañusca, the tourists called ‘Dead Woman’s Pass’ – 4215m/13779ft).
THIRD DAY- BACK IN THE PAST! BEAUTIFUL SCENERY AND A SHORT WALK TO CAMP
This is considered the most impressive day so just keep thinking of that on the ascent on day 2! Again we wake up for breakfast at 6:30 am, and start the day with a gentle climb to visit the archaeological site of ‘Phuyupatamarca’(meaning ‘Town in the Clouds’) 
FOUR DAY SUN GATE AND MACHUPICCHU– YOU MADE IT! We leave the last campsite at 5:30am on the final day 
http://www.incatrailbookings.com/
summary: If you choose to do the short Inca Trail 2 Days/1Night
